gui.simpleclouds.cloud_previewer.title: Cloud Previewer
gui.simpleclouds.config.movementSmoothin: Specifies if some movement smoothing should be applied to the clouds so they don't look as distracting. May impact performance.
gui.simpleclouds.config.noiseThreshold.d:
Specifies the noise threshold for the clouds. Impacts how big each individual cloud is.
Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0
gui.simpleclouds.config.speedModifier.de:
Specifies the movement speed of the clouds.
Range: 0.1 ~ 10.0
